entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
